subject: feat: improve dashboard consistency and chart visibility
body:
- Fix chart text visibility in dark mode (lighter label colors)
- Add summary cards to Activity and Breakdown tabs for consistent UX
- Make section expand/collapse consistent (primary sections expanded by default)
- Hide Developer Patterns section for non-developer views
- Add backlog items: techy theme, date exclusions, filter presets, match logic
title: improve dashboard consistency and chart visibility
